604.quoteText:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in our sole discretion.
If we make changes to this Privacy Policy, we will post the revised Privacy Policy on the Platform and update the “Last Amended” date below.
Please be sure to periodically check this page to ensure that you are aware of any changes to this Privacy Policy.
Any material changes to this Privacy Policy will be communicated to registered users by a notification to their account and/or by posting a notice of the change on the Website.
Your continued access to or use of the Platform after the effective date of such changes will be subject to the revised Privacy Policy.</p
604.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
tosdr.tldr: When SoundCloud decides to modify the terms of service, they notify you by email. The changes will go in application after 6 weeks, leaving a reasonable amount of time for you to consider whether you agree to the changes.

609.title: The terms are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud provides an index describing what each section is about. Thus, you can easily identify which sections you care about and jump directly to these sections.

696.quoteText:
Change of Control</strong&gt.
– We may also share your personal data as part of a sale, merger or change in control of SoundCloud, or in preparation for any of these events.
Any other entity that buys us or part of our business will have the right to continue to use your data, but only in the manner set out in this Privacy Policy unless you agree otherwise
696.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
tosdr.tldr: SoundCloud “We may disclose your personal information to any person or company that acquires all or substantially all of the assets or business of SoundCloud, or on a merger of our business, or in the event of our insolvency. ”

816.quoteText: this Agreement is subject to the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (CISG) and excluding the principles of conflict of laws (international private law)
816.title: SoundCloud's jurisdiction is in Germany

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

1021.quoteText:
ou may terminate this Agreement at any time by sending notice in writing to SoundCloud at Rheinsberger Str.
76/77, 10115 Berlin, Germany confirming such termination, by removing all of Your Content from your account, or by deleting your account and thereafter by ceasing to use the Platform.
1021.title: You can terminate your account

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: In order to terminate your agreement to the terms, you need to send a written notice to SoundCloud, Berlin. All your content and your activity will be “irretrievably deleted by SoundCloud, except to the extent that we are obliged or permitted to retain such content, data or information for a certain period of time in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and/or to protect our legitimate business interests”. You should back up your tracks yourself.

6636.quoteText:
We share the data collected about you, generally in hashed, aggregated, or de-identified forms with advertisers and advertising service providers and business partners in order to serve ads based on your interests and measure the reach and effectiveness of those ads, including whether a user took an action (e.g.
purchase a product).
6636.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

6637.quoteText: that promotes or incites violence, terrorism, illegal acts, or hatred on the grounds of race, ethnicity, cultural identity, religious belief, disability, gender, identity or sexual orientation

tosdr.case: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

6639.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

6640.quoteText: THE PLATFORM, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE WEBSITE, THE APPS AND ALL CONTENT AND SERVICES ACCESSED THROUGH OR VIA THE WEBSITE, THE APPS, THE SERVICES OR OTHERWISE, ARE PROVIDED "AS IS", "AS AVAILABLE", AND "WITH ALL FAULTS

7578.quoteText: that you are either 18 years of age or more, or the applicable age of majority in your jurisdiction, or if you are under 18 years of age or the age of majority in your jurisdiction, you are 16 years of age or more if you reside in the European Union or 13 years of age or more if you reside in the United States or anywhere else.</p

9967.quoteText: p>You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your username and password, and you will remain responsible for all use of your username and password, and all activity emanating from your account, whether or not such activity was authorized by you.</p
